title: Sardar Awais, Muhammad Aurangzeb meet SINOSURE’s President
content:
BEIJING, Jul 25 (APP): Minister for Energy (Power Division) Sardar Awais Ahmad Khan Leghari and Minister for Finance and Revenue Muhammad Aurangzeb on Thursday held a bilateral meeting with President of SINOSURE Sheng Hetai.
The Ministers briefed the President on the Government’s efforts for economic recovery and growth, energy and taxation sectors, said a press release.
Both sides also exchanged views to strengthen bilateral economic cooperation, especially financial and banking cooperation.
The two sides also discussed expanding CPEC and role of private sector, as it transitions to its next phase of its implementation.
